thread.title: Chris Perez Watched 'Selena' And Live Blogged His Reactions | Alex | KISS 95.7
thread.title_full: Chris Perez Watched 'Selena' And Live Blogged His Reactions | Alex | KISS 95.7

title: Chris Perez Watched 'Selena' And Live Blogged His Reactions | Alex | KISS 95.7
text:
Chris Perez Watched 'Selena' And Live Blogged His Reactions posted by Alex Gervasi - share 
The movie Selena first came out in 1997 and ever since then it's been a fan favorite. 
Starring Jennifer Lopez, the biopic came out just two years after the Tejano singer was murdered. The movie focused on her rise to stardom and romance with her husband, Chris Perez. 
On Tuesday night, the late singer's widower decided to watch the film on Lifetime for the first time since it's premiere. 
Get ready to be hit in the feels. 
Guess what just started on the Lifetime tv channel...yup. Gonna grab a bottle of wine from the kitchen and sit through... Posted by Chris Perez on Monday, February 6, 2017 
He seemed a bit nervous and we can't blame him. 
Ugh, don't know if I can do this. The TRUE test will be when my "character" comes out. :/ 
But that didn't last long. 
Hah ....A.B. "So much for MY bustier!" Cool! 
Turns out the "Anything for Salinas" part was based on true events. 
I heard about the "bumper story." That happened before I was in the band. #Funny #AnythingForSelenas 
He then got nervous again right before the actor who played him came out. 
But like Jon Seda is super hot so he shouldn't be. 
Here...we...go...
